[Page Title: Holy City Brewing - North Charleston, SC]

Are you over 21?
Yes, I am over 21 Nope I'm not over 21 
1021 Aragon Ave, North Charleston, SC 29405
Visit us at map marker pin Daily Specials 
Happy Hour, Live Music and More

We have half-off flagship drafts and appetizer deals for Happy Hour on Monday thru Thursday from 4-6pm, live music on Fridays from 5-8pm, and Wednesday Nights we have Live Team Trivia from 6-8pm where you compete for house cash. We’re always changing it up with rotating food and cocktail specials! There's never a dull moment at HCB.
Specials slideshow start stop playing Slide 1 content Slide 2 content previous slide next slide 
Visit Our Taproom

A DIVERSE TAPLIST, FULL IN-HOUSE FOOD MENU, AND DAILY SPECIALS
Food Menu 
Groups & Parties

YOUR EVENT, OUR SPACE

Holy City Brewing boasts four different event spaces for every function and occasion, no matter the event. The Mezzanine is a private upstairs dining room with its own bar. The Aqua Lounge is a 21-and-up game room. The Courtyard is an open-air space that can fit up to one hundred guests. The Porter Room is for the biggest of events, with its own prep kitchen, full bar, and marshside views.
Host an Event 
Raw Bar

The Walrus at Holy City is our in-house raw bar, offering delicious cuisine from the sea, both near and far. Oysters on the half-shell, ceviche and peel-and-eat shrimp are some of the usual suspects being served here, but their menu and wine selection rotate regularly. The offerings from the Raw Bar can be ordered from any server around the property. Wed-Thu-Fri-Sat 11am-9pm.
Our Story 
Serving the community since 2011

The Holy City story is about a team of four guys dedicated to craft beer and their community, aiming to bring more of one to the other.
Learn more about us 
We are hiring!

We are looking for great people to join our amazing team! Check out our current job openings and apply with just a few clicks!
Apply Now for a job

Reviews
Start stop reviews carousel 
Google reviews

Emily N:
five star review by 
They have by far the best sours I've tried from other breweries here in SC so far! Their pretzels, immaculate and to die for! Also I think are the best so far on the East Coast!! Their ghost cheese fritters amazing too!

Google reviews

Jason B:
five star review by 
It's an awesome location with a ton of space. The beers were great. The raw bar was incredible. Great selection of oysters! They had super creative oyster shooters that were amazing. Can't wait to go back.

Google reviews

Haley H:
five star review by 
Myself and some friends came here for the NYE party and it was such a fun experience! The service was top notch. We never had an empty drink and everyone checked on us religiously. Even the bathroom was well kept and I could tell everyone working was very happy to be there.

Google reviews

Chris W:
five star review by 
First time here and loved it! Excellent brunch menu and great service to keep the mimosas flowing. My chicken and waffles was a hit. Nice and crunchy. Nice heat without being overwhelming. Hot, crispy waffles. Yum. We also got the breakfast burrito and the breakfast bowl. Everyone loved their dishes!

Google reviews

Ashley W:
five star review by 
Completely in love with this place! Went here to wind down from the shots and the food is amazing! We were hooked on their Hard sodas and walked out with several Growlers & Crowlers! Love that it's also very inclusive & friendly for everyone!

Stay in the loop!

[Page Title: Holy City Brewing - Events]

Events

Valentine's Oyster Roast

Saturday February 7th

Drink beer, eat oysters, and shop at a local vendor market with someone you love at Holy City Brewing on February 7th.

Oyster Roast starts at 11am and goes until we run out!

Want to go casual? Get a GA ticket and go at your own pace.

Want to skip the lines? Got a squad who deserves the royal treatment? Go VIP and get your own private table.

It’s up to you!

Sponsored by Bottles. Vendors in the Porter Room.
GET TICKETS HERE! 
**VIP Tables are very limited, with a MAX CAPACITY of 10 per table, and must be purchased prior to February 1st, 2026.**

11:00 AM - 04:00 PM
